senses.sight: A $size clump of dust, hair, and other light debris

source.title: Wikipedia
source.entry: (idiomatic) A small clump of dust, fluff, hair, particles of skin, etc. that tends to accumulate indoors in areas that are not regularly dusted, such as under heavy furniture.

source.title: User Friendly
source.entry: "Why do I get the feeling that this is leading somewhere really bad?" -- Smiling Man
